name: Yosemite Birding: It's a Snap!
description:
Made for http://www.awfuljams.com/big-awful-2016

Theme: Games for Grandpa

Follow Judd and Greg along as they take a trip to the Yosemite National Park.

Learn about different birds that live in the park!

Snap lots of pictures!
